name: MEME QUEST - A DEEP ADVENTURE ABOUT LOVE AND SACRIFICE.
name_original: MEME QUEST - A DEEP ADVENTURE ABOUT LOVE AND SACRIFICE.
description:
MEME QUEST A GAME ABOUT CHOICES AND LIFE.

Welcome to meme quest. A game created by Oliver Buckley using twine, CSS and html. In this game you are thrown into the world of a man suffering in eternal pain. You play with the computer known as COMPUTER who manipulates your every movie.

DONATION REWARDS

5 CENTS: YOUR VERY OWN ENDING

10 BUCKS: I CHANGE THE GAME TO YOUR NAME.

UPDATES

1.0 Game created

1.1 New Endings, New options and updated color scheme and new website design.

LEADERBOARDS

If you find the secret "You are win ending" and let me know I will add you to the leaderboard.

1. Oliver Buckley

2. Christopher (shreklord) Bogomas

3: Julian Powell

4: Oliver Morrison

5: Benjamen Franco.

6. Luca Burlacu (FIRST TRY)
